code: import{Link,useLocation}from"react-router-dom";import"./sidebar.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Sidebar=()=>{const location=useLocation();const links=[{to:"/",label:"Home"},{to:'/pricingList',label:"Pricing List"},{to:"/admintrend",label:"Admin Trends"},{to:"/customerquote",label:"Get a quote"},{to:"/utilization",label:"Utilization dashboard"}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"sidebar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:links.map(_ref=>{let{to,label}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:location.pathname===to?"active":"",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:to,children:label})},to);})})});};export default Sidebar;
